package.name: KontrolSquid
package.descr: Kontrol Customized High performance web proxy cache (3.4 branch). It combines Squid as a proxy server with its capabilities of acting as a HTTP / HTTPS reverse proxy.<br /> It includes an Exchange-Web-Access (OWA) Assistant, SSL filtering and antivirus integration via C-ICAP. Also, integrates Squid with E2Guardian with Custom Kontrol Blacklist Support.
